snippet: When Matt Brewster opened 30th Street Guitars in Midtown Manhattan, he envisioned a friendly, low-key sales and repair shop without snobbery and pretense.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on 30th Street Guitars, musicians’ haven in Midtown Manhattan that features expansive, floor-to-ceiling wall of specialty electric and acoustic guitars.
lead_paragraph: When Matt Brewster opened 30th Street Guitars in Midtown Manhattan, he envisioned a friendly, low-key sales and repair shop without snobbery and pretense.

headline.main: 30th Street Guitars, a Shop of Good Vibrations
